name: Thief Simulator Sneak Robbery
description:
Let’s become a thief and sneak into the rich people houses & steal valuable items from their safest vaults and treasuries, in this thief simulator you have to collects certain items around the city and sneak in to the people house and steal their valuables items. Which you can sell for money and buy yourself a house you always dreamed of, you might have played other thief and sneak robbery games on the store but this thief simulator is not just limited to the house burglary, you can rob a bank for the jack pot, and other then that you can also steal confidential files from the cooperate offices.

Features:
Multiple house to rob valuable items
Bank robbery exciting missions
Cooperate offices robbery stealth missions
Pawn shop to sell stolen items
A luxury house to buy with the stolen money.
